question: This annual event held in several major cities in Finland is one of many all-night arts festival whose name is given to areas of high latitude in the weeks around what?
llm_answer: The name “White Night” is given to areas of high latitude in the weeks around the summer solstice in June.

scores.explanation: The Model Answer correctly identifies the summer solstice as the time period associated with the name 'White Night' in areas of high latitude, which aligns with the Gold Answer and is supported by the Retrieved Context. It is concise and accurate, covering all necessary facts.
